about_the_game:
Just a Memory features Aaron Page a 19 year-old college student who gets an acquaintance with Olivia Winters, a new and popular student. When Aaron's world is turned upside down by the murder of his best friend, the pair soon find themselves investigating the murder while Aaron confronting his demons.

Features


  • Choice and consequence driven narrative adventure
  • Multiple endings depending on the choices you make
  • Side quests to interact more with the surroundings





*Development screenshots. Subject to change.
*Screenshots are captured for one location (college).
*Other environments/locations are currently under development.
*Characters and environments are being utilized from Daz 3D and Unity.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130T @ 2.90GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Nvidia GTX 680, 2GB AMD R9 27
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 @ 3.2GHz

  • Graphics: 4GB Nvidia GTX 970, 4GB AMD RX 470
